name: HELLO-LD44
description:
Eyhh me again!!

This time I made another moody game.

Move your mouse and try not to touch almost anything in this game, except a few objects that seem friendly :).

In this game, you won't die. When you touch something terrible and get hurt, a lil dark part of you(I call it "a spirit") will be generated. 

Wait those lil spirits became bright and click right mouse to recycle them.
Remember, you have to get close to recycle each one of the spirits. Only after clearing all your souls, you can get to the next level. (Btw, I only made 2 levels this time.)

So, good luck.
